item.title:

No need for too much planning.
item.dc:creator: @lylo
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @lylo: Companies spend way too much time planning. 

Hoping that a buttoned up detailed plan will help them ship more. They hire professional planners vs builders. More planning happens.

My suggestion‚Ä¶ focus on consistent progress by building vs trying too hard to guess the future.
item.dc:creator: @jmwind
item.description:
Companies spend way too much time planning.
